author: alpha7wins
content:
Hi
I am **Leo**, a blockchain expert and I have **7** years of experience in IT industry and especially, last **5** years of experience are mostly related to **web3 **technologies.

Over the years, I have refined my expertise in various technologies such as **JavaScript**, **Go**, **Typescript**, **Python**, and **Solidity**. I developed **DEX**, **Cross chain Bridge** using **Uniswap**, and **NFT **marketplace as well. Currently, my focus is on web3 technology and I am very interested in projects related to** Cosmos SDK**.
